      • randomLocation

        public org.bukkit.Location randomLocation(boolean safe)
        Description copied from interface: Region
        Returns a random location from within this region.
        Specified by:
        randomLocation in interface Region
        Parameters:
        safe - Whether or not the location should be safe to spawn a normal mob (2x1). Since regions define blocks mobs can spawn on top of, searching for safe locations will involve looking up for a suitable location. Regions should be defined to minimize the number of blocks above potential spawning locations to avoid overhead in spawning.
